item.title: Ive spawned but how they talk?!?!?
item.dc:creator: @Speak Speak
item.description:
@Speak wrote:

hmm 1 sec[br][size=1]Posted on: June 25, 2007, 10:48:21 AM[/size][hr]try this 1 i think its a lil different

if (npcs[i].npcType == ID HERE) { if (misc.random2(30) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "WHAT YOU WANT THEM TO SAY!"; } }[br][size=1]Posted on: June 25, 2007, 10:50:15 AM[/size][hr][quote=“akisboy32, post:1, topic:116299”][quote author=barragey0uXD link=topic=165247.msg1540093#msg1540093 date=1182731610]
To spawn objects you need to have the Global object tutorial added to your server, i still got the txt file of it… But when i give you the txt file dont leech it! I didnt made it but if you leech it be not nice for the tutorial poster.
[/quote] and sorry to say but he’s just trying to help, that’s a .txt file they can never contain viruses

dude what the hell you doing??
i dont think i would download that!!!
virus??? “bacteria” ? lol
i dont want it on my pc[/quote]

and sorry to say but he’s just trying to help, that’s a .txt file they can never contain viruses

@Speak wrote:

ok go to npchandler.java search for “moo” after the last } add this if (npcs[i].npcType == NPC ID HERE ){ if (misc.random2(50) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "WHAT YOU WANT THEM TO SAY HERE"; } }

change the stuff in caps to w/e you want rep plz?
